index_intro_1.message: This is a simple browser extension.

index_intro_2.message: Explore the use of browser bookmarks without pressure.

index_intro_3.message: all data comes from your current browser and there are no network requests.

index_title2_p1.message: While browsing the web page, you can use the 'Alt+F' key to quickly call out the search dialog box and retrieve your bookmarks. You can use '↑/↓' to quickly move the highlighted option, and press the 'Enter' key to open the selected bookmark in the new label. At the same time, you can use 'Alt+Enter' to search the keywords you enter in the corresponding search engine.

index_title2_p2.message: If the shortcut key is invalid or you want to replace it, please visit here:

index_title3_p1.message: This extension will compare all your bookmark data, find and list those bookmarks with the same url address, and you will handle them.

index_title3_p2.message: Note: This function will directly operate the bookmarks in your browser. Once deleted, it cannot be retrieved.
